Released Versions

V1.0.0 - June 24th 2018 (Deprecated)
  • works with Expressjs >= 4.3.x
  • works with Typescript >= 2.2.x
  • works with Nodejs >= 8.10.x
V2.0.0 - August 16th 2018 (Current)

There are no breaking API changes from V1.x.x to V2.x.x. You can easily upgrade.

  • works with Expressjs >= 4.3.x
  • works with Typescript >= 2.2.x
  • works with Nodejs >= 8.10.x
Why V2.x.x is released in less time?

We have added lot of new API methods (without breaking V1.x API) and features to make developer lives easier. To have a proper tracking on features list, we have preferred to release V2.x.x.
